alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:14PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. So far around 3 to 5 inches of snow has fallen with locally higher amounts near Teton village and Wilson and Daniel. Additional Snowfall accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with lesser amounts towards Pinedale. * WHERE...Jackson Hole, Star Valley and Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Thursday. Moderate snow will again break out after midnight tonight, with heavy snow possible Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a quarter of mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
